entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lucky Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lucky Lake 11:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:19 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 5.
